title: UK looks to Sweden for a solution to nuclear waste
description: After decades of experimentation Sweden is ahead of the UK when dealing with nuclear waste.

title: 'I turned my front room into a full-time bakery'
description: Ben Gray explains why he turned his home into a bakery in lockdown.

title: Undeclared pools in France uncovered by AI technology
description: Millions in tax revenue has been collected after more than 20,000 undeclared pools were found.
